nodes.text: During the early years of the Galactic Empire, the Chevin Ganga Lor operated a criminal organization that was based on Sel Zonn Station, a space station that orbited the planet Brentaal IV. In about 17 BBY, Lor led all of the members of his organization in an attack on the headquarters of the rival organization of the protocol droid Switch, in Deep Storage Bay V14 of the station. However, Lor and every single member of his organization were killed during the attack.
